settings.title: Anesthesia Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure anesthesia module settings including items, groups, and surgery rooms.
settings.moduleNotConfiguredMessage: Your unit is not configured for the anesthesia module. Please contact your hospital admin to enable this module for your unit.
settings.itemsDescription: Configure which inventory items should appear in anesthesia records. Click an item in the right panel to configure medication/infusion details.
settings.administrationGroupsDescription: Manage groups for organizing medications in anesthesia charts. Use up/down buttons to reorder.
settings.noGroupsYet: No groups yet. Click "Add Group" to create one.
settings.surgeryRoomsDescription: Manage operating rooms for the anesthesia module. Use up/down buttons to reorder.
settings.noRoomsYet: No surgery rooms yet. Click "Add Room" to create one.
settings.commonAllergiesDescription: Manage the list of common allergies available in patient records and pre-op assessments.
settings.noAllergiesConfigured: No allergies configured. Add one above.
settings.medicationListsDescription: Manage medication lists used in pre-operative assessments.
settings.medicalHistoryListsDescription: Manage illness options organized by body system for pre-operative assessments.
settings.whoChecklistsDescription: Manage checklist items for the three phases of surgical procedures.
settings.ampuleBagContentHelp: Enter the total amount per ampule or bag (e.g., 50 mg for Rocuronium, 1000 ml for Ringerfundin)
settings.rateControlledInfusionHelp: Rate-controlled infusions show rate changes with vertical ticks. Free-flow infusions (e.g., Ringer) show as dashed lines.
settings.configurationUpdatedDescription: Anesthesia item configuration has been saved

reports.title: Reports & Analytics
reports.subtitle: View and export anesthesia case reports
reports.comingSoonDescription: Comprehensive reporting and analytics features are currently under development. You will be able to generate detailed case reports, track anesthesia metrics, and export data for analysis.

patientDetail.errorMovingToDraftDesc: Failed to move assessment back to draft status.
patientDetail.generalAnesthesiaDescription: Complete loss of consciousness using intravenous and/or inhaled medications.
patientDetail.generalAnesthesiaRisks: Nausea, vomiting, sore throat, dental damage, awareness during anesthesia (rare), allergic reactions, cardiovascular complications.
patientDetail.regionalAnesthesiaDescription: Numbing of a specific region using local anesthetic injections (spinal, epidural, nerve blocks).
patientDetail.regionalAnesthesiaRisks: Headache, back pain, nerve damage (rare), hypotension, bleeding, infection at injection site.
patientDetail.plannedInstallationsDescription: Placement of intravenous lines, arterial lines, central lines, or urinary catheters as needed.
patientDetail.plannedInstallationsRisks: Infection, bleeding, hematoma, pneumothorax (for central lines), thrombosis.
patientDetail.postoperativeIcuDescription: Transfer to Intensive Care Unit for close monitoring after surgery.
patientDetail.postoperativeIcuPurpose: Purpose: Close hemodynamic monitoring, respiratory support, pain management, and early detection of complications.
patientDetail.consentNotesPlaceholder: e.g., Consent given via phone call, patient needs translator, legal guardian present...
patientDetail.noEmailAvailable: No email address available for the patient
